item.title: Progressive Web Apps Resources
item.description: These resources are based on the research I did for the PWA Article. Articles & Tutorials Google’s Progressive Web App Checklist Service Workers: an Introduction - Google Developers Your First Progressive Web App — Google Developers The Web App Manifest — Google Developers A Beginner’s Guide To Progressive Web Apps — Smashing Magazine The Building Blocks Of Progressive Web Apps — Smashing Magazine Progressive Web AMPs — Smashing Magazine The Future of The Web — A List Apart Improve Your SEO Indirectly With Progressive Web Apps — SEO Hacker Progressive Web Apps Increase Conversion Rates: What You Need to Know — Business.

item.title: Static Websites & the JAMstack Resources
item.description: These resources are based on the research I did for the Static Websites & the JAMstack article. Articles & Tutorials StaticGen.com - Top Open-Source Static Site Generators JAMstack.org - Best Practices, Examples, & Resources What is a Headless CMS? - A straight forward explanation on the subject Staticsitegenerators.net - A list of all of the current static site generators in the market Headlesscms.org - A list of the popular headless CMSes available An Introduction to Static Site Generators - A thorough article on the intro to static site generators Using A Static Site Generator At Scale: Lessons Learned - Using an SSG at scale JAMstack for Clients - The pros and cons of introducing static sites to the client/agency world Zero to HTTP/2 with AWS and Hugo - Tutorial on how to setup Hugo on AWS How to Build an API-Powered, Static Website: The Best of Both Worlds - Good way to start learning APIs Static Site Generators Reviewed: Jekyll, Middleman, Roots, Hugo - The top SSGs reviewed and compared Talks & Videos The New Front-end Stack.
